text: Welcome to the Dollhouse is an American 1995 teen comedy movie. It is about bullying and dysfunctional family life. This independent comedy started the acting career of Heather Matarazzo, who plays Dawn Weiner. It received positive reviews from critics. It was a success at the box office. Category:1995 comedy movies Category:1990s teen comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about pedophilia
title: Welcome to the Dollhouse
